compliant.section: Unless requested otherwise by the applicable laws, we will not disclose your Personal Information to third parties for their own independent marketing or business purposes without your consent.
Unless requested otherwise by the applicable laws, we will not disclose your Personal Information to third parties for their own independent marketing or business purposes without your consent.

non_compliant.section: The term “control” means the legal, beneficial or equitable ownership, directly or indirectly, of more than fifty percent (50%) of the capital stock (or other ownership interest, if not a corporation) of an entity ordinarily having voting rights.
non_compliant.amend: This section is not related to data protection and does not require amendment for GDPR compliance.

non_compliant.section: We may disclose your information to the following entities:
non_compliant.legal provisions: Information to be provided where personal data are collected from the data subject
non_compliant.amend: This section should be amended to explicitly specify the categories of recipients of the personal data, as required by Articles 13(1)(e) and 14(1)(e) of the GDPR.
